name: picketing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an activity in which a worker or group of workers protest outside a building to prevent other workers from going inside: The proposed new law would ban picketing. See
picket
More examplesFewer examplesThe dramatic unfolding of events, particularly the mass picketing and the response of the police, is well known.National NAACP leaders announced a boycott against the 24-hotel chain in July, calling for picketing outside hotels nationwide.Ramp workers, who soundly rejected a contract deal and remain in mediated talks, this month staged the first picketing against the airline in more than two decades.
